short_summary: Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a supplier to provide OneWeb Satellite Services. This solicitation aims to acquire a 3-year term, plus 3 additional 1-year options for satellite services. Bidders can register through the SSC P2P portal to view and access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates, and be awarded contracts.
description: This solicitation is for the supply of OneWeb Satellite Services. The contract will be for a 3-year term, with the possibility of 3 additional one-year options. The contract will be used by Shared Services Canada and other departments and agencies to provide shared services to their clients.
full_summary:
# RFP - OneWeb Satellite Services
## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017714/21225
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-10 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 16
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: No specific date has been indicated
* **Expected Contract End Date**: No specific date has been indicated
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Tender Description

This solicitation is issued by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for the supply of OneWeb Satellite Services. The contract will be used by SSC and/or other departments and agencies to provide shared services to one or more clients. The intended procurement aims to acquire satellite services to meet the requirements stated in the Statement of Work, which is available under the attached documents section.

The contract will be for a three-year term, with an additional three one-year options. Bidders may register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation, submit a response, and receive updates and amendments.

Please note that the tender closing date has passed, and the tender status is expired.

## Attachments

For further information, please refer to the attached documents, which can be accessed via the links below:

* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/158217C8-505C-4A1C-A38B-F339C84EA6F5
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/22A6C89C-D32E-4D1A-97FF-919171116EE6
* https://ss
